description: To address the Microsoft QUIC denial of service issue described in CVE-2023-36435, system administrators should apply the relevant security updates based on their system versions. For Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based systems, update to build 10.0.22621.2428 with KB5031354 available at https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5031354. Alternatively, for Windows 11 Version 21H2 for both x64 and arm64 systems, update to build 10.0.22000.2538 with KB5031358, found at https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5031358. Lastly, Windows Server 2022 systems should use the update package KB5031364, available at https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5031364, to remain secure against this issue.
